attributes.action: Create a public holiday once the Covid-19 pandemic has been defeated.
attributes.additional_details:
We have all been affected by the misery Covid-19 has brought to us, country and worldwide.
Once we have, through our collective efforts, come out of the pandemic and epidemic we all deserve to reward ourselves by celebrating during an annual public holiday.
attributes.background:
After the Covid-19 pandemic and epidemic has been defeated create a public holiday to celebrate our collective feat.
Open discussions with countries worldwide for them to do the same, on the same day.
